content.rendered:
Think and Grow Rich! contains over 20 years of research into the lives and philosophies of more than 500 of the most successful people in America. Most noteworthy is entrepreneur Andrew Carnegie’s secret to success, revealed to Napoleon Hill during private interviews with Carnegie, the richest man of his time.

This timeless classic presents a systematic nuts-and-bolts approach to developing the skills and mind-set required to achieve exceptional success in any field or endeavor, personal or professional. Think and Grow Rich! is not just a self-improvement book, it creates in you a success-consciousness and then gives you a detailed blueprint for achieving that success.
